Reviews.Title: Three wires, not three pairs.  Not what I was expecting.
Reviews.Author: Loki
Reviews.Content: Although this has RJ12 connectors, it's not RJ 12 cable for use with landlines.  It's 3 cables, with shielding and exposed wire strands.  It's actually for a DVR system.  I found that out after I tried to crimp on end on.  I was only able to to use a single pair for a single phone line so it worked, but I was not what I wanted.  The description does make note that its for DVR systems, but never clearly says how many wires it has.  I gave it one star not because of the quality or even the lack of wire description but just to get the attention of anyone who might be considering it for landlines.  For DVR systems it probably works fine, seems like a good quality cable.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed.
Reviews.Author: Peavy
Reviews.Content: We needed some additional length of cable for our cameras and they show great picture with this additional RJ12 cable.

Reviews.Title: perfect for my application
Reviews.Author: RenoRed
Reviews.Content: Just what you need for those long Revo video camera runs to the far ends of your home or business.

Reviews.Title: Revo Video Cable
Reviews.Author: Louis Vaccaro "Curtain Shop dot com"
Reviews.Content: Needed a few extra feet (about 80!) of cable for the Revo camera system and this did the trick.  One last camera for our store.Great price, fast service, and it works fine.

Reviews.Title: This not RJ12 its RJ11
Reviews.Author: buysalotfromamazon "jeffstechbooks"
Reviews.Content: This is 4 conductor wire, not 6.  RJ12 is 6 conductor.  The description clearly states that it is RJ12 wire.

Reviews.Title: alot of cable
Reviews.Author: john green
Reviews.Content: the cable is good and water poof and it go along way to run the up under your house and pouch.

Reviews.Title: Expensive, proprietary cable that is well-made
Reviews.Author: Steven D. Osborne "By then I'll know better!"
Reviews.Content: The quality is good enough for commercial application; however, it is proprietary and expensive.  Other than that, if you need to extend your camera's reach, this is well-worth the use.

Reviews.Title: Awesome wire for the distance needed
Reviews.Author: Muss
Reviews.Content: At first I thought that with a cable this long it would degrade signal to the video stream well I was wrong. Revo is a great brand and I use it more often with most of my clients now with just running one wire for power and video.

Reviews.Title: Revo 300ft Cable-Plug in Go
Reviews.Author: handywoman
Reviews.Content: Purchased this cable to add a camera to our Revo system that we have for a few years now. The system is great and this cable is awesome; has held up very well during rain and extremely hot temperatures. Cable is currently ran both indoor and outdoor.Easy to install into the camera and system, plugs in just like a Ethernet Cable or your grandparents old school phone jack; 1 click and your in. Recommend T59 Wire/Cable Fastening Gun for stapling wire onto both interior and exterior walls. Also, there are various sizes of insulted fasteners/staples that can be used to secure the wire without damage. Lastly, Arrow T59 is made in the USA!

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: This RJ12 cable has been used to extend an existing camera system cable due to insufficient length. It carries audio and video as well as the original cable included with the camera system. Works well so far.

Reviews.Title: Revo Cable Its Good
Reviews.Author: Travis S.
Reviews.Content: Good Cable Works Fine, Its The Only Thing I Think Works With The Revo System I think.Solid cable Feels Like Cat 5

Reviews.Title: Just want I needed
Reviews.Author: montanacruiser
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I wanted and it was super easy to assemble.  They only thing is I have an after market camera that has audio and Revo cables only are good for power and video and the Revo coupler only offer video and power also… no audio.  That being said it works great and I would recommend it… good price

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: JEFFREY S PSYCK
Reviews.Content: Brand new product that was exactly as advertised and worked perfectly.  Recommend this item to any shopper looking for this cable.  Comes with connector too.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great Value Cable
Reviews.Author: Letitia D. Schnobrich "LDSchnobrich"
Reviews.Content: We live in a very rural area and ended up putting a security system in.  We love the Revo system!  We have added cameras to this system and with that, needed more cable.  The value you get on Amazon.com can't be beat so we know exactly where we can get the best for less.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: angel
Reviews.Content: Good service fast on time good communication good product price etc etc etc and ect no problem with fue ítem

Reviews.Title: How can you mess up cable?
Reviews.Author: Darrell Mcclung "ob1kanokie"
Reviews.Content: Answer:  Put lousy ends on them.  Revo has a serious problem in that their cameras often require a double female connector between the cable end and camera.  I have now gone through at least 10 of these connectors.  Not from mis-use, but exposure to the elements make them die a very sudden death.  The electrical connections in the ones I have committed to the grave yard for expensive toys, have completely dissolved.  They just don't exist any more.  I had three of these do that within the first two months that I owned the new Revo DVR system.  I have told Revo of this and they declined to send me any replacements.  Didn't refuse, just didn't bother, kind of a deal.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly
Reviews.Author: Ryan L. Frisby "Ryan"
Reviews.Content: This was just what I needed to het my camera's where they needed to be. They had it in the right length and it installed easily. It comes with the adapter so you can just attach it to the existing cabled that came with the kit.

Reviews.Title: Revo Camera CABLES
Reviews.Author: cole_clausen2288
Reviews.Content: I received these extra cables for my security system extremely fast and in great working order. Would definitely order from them again and will refer anyone to use this camera system as well.

Reviews.Title: Revo Camera CABLES
Reviews.Author: cole_clausen2288
Reviews.Content: I received these cables extremely fast and in great working order. Would definitely order from them again and will refer anyone to use this camera system as well.

Reviews.Title: Beware
Reviews.Author: Security Guy
Reviews.Content: This is probably a great product and okay price for your security system as long as you're sure its the wire you need!!!!  My security systems wire looks exactly identical to this wire in both looks and despription but unfortunately I needed RJ11 wire.  This wire is RJ12, but how does one know theres a difference without an explination.  Suffice it to say I feel for the better price and bought 2 of these.  Amazons return policy is absolutely horrible by the way.  By the time you pay to ship and have the 20% restocking free reduced from your original order, you'll be lucky to get back half of what you ordered.  And price pros that sells this wire isn't fun to deal with.  I returned my wire via postal instead of ups, and it sent them for such a loop it took an additional 3 weeks to get my refund.  Anyway, this is more of a rant, but most security systems need RJ11, which is hard to find, so beware!

Reviews.Title: Revo Security Systems
Reviews.Author: Ducks Fan
Reviews.Content: this wire was needed as an addition to complete an install of a 10 camera, 16 channel Revo Security system. We needed extra cable because of the distance between one camera and the DVR placement. The system is very good overall, the cameras are near broadcast quality, and are pretty good at night. Many options for recording the individual cameras and many options for playback/review of what has been captured. Install and set up was very easy, and the ability to network allows remote monitoring off site.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: The1Nightmare
Reviews.Content: Bought for a Samsung DVR system, did not work. Checked the ends for connectivity and only got connection on 3 pins.  Removed one end to find that the cable only has 3 wires with shield, not 6 wires.

ProductInfo.Features:
30-Feet RJ12 Cable
Connect your camera to your DVR quickly and easily
One cable supplies power, data and video
RJ12 connectors for easy connection
ProductInfo.Name: Revo R30RJ12C 30-Feet Cable with Coupler
